faqItems.a1: IC-Gold is an advanced crypto investment platform that provides market tracking tools, Copy Trade from experts, and attractive referral programs. We are committed to delivering a safe and profitable investment experience.
faqItems.q2: How do I create an account?
faqItems.a2: You can register an account using your email or phone number. After registration, the system will send an OTP code via email for verification. Complete the verification and you can start using immediately.
faqItems.a3: IC-Gold supports deposits via TRC20 network (USDT). Go to Deposit, copy the wallet address, send USDT from your wallet, then enter the Transaction Hash to request deposit. Admin will confirm within 24 hours.
faqItems.a4: Copy Trade allows you to automatically copy trades from experts. With a balance of $1,000 or more, you can activate Copy Trade and the system will automatically copy 5% of your assets following expert trades.
faqItems.q5: What is the minimum requirement for Copy Trade?
faqItems.a5: To use the Copy Trade feature, your account needs a minimum balance of $1,000. This ensures you have sufficient capital to participate in copy trading.
faqItems.q6: How does the referral program work?
faqItems.a6: Each account has a unique referral code. When friends register with your code and make their first successful deposit, you will receive $10 bonus. Each code can be used up to 10 times.
faqItems.a7: Go to Withdraw, enter the amount you want to withdraw (minimum $50) and your TRC20 wallet address. Withdrawal requests are processed within 24 business hours.
faqItems.q8: What is 2FA and how do I enable it?
faqItems.a8: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is an additional security feature. When 2FA is enabled, you will need to enter an OTP code sent via email each time you log in. Go to Settings > Security to enable 2FA.
faqItems.q9: I forgot my password, what should I do?
faqItems.a9: On the login page, click "Forgot password" and enter your registered email. The system will send a password reset link to your email.
faqItems.q10: How long does transaction processing take?
faqItems.a10: Deposits: 1-24 hours after admin confirmation. Withdrawals: 1-24 business hours. Actual time may be faster depending on blockchain network.

termsContent.intro: Welcome to IC-Gold. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully before using our services.
section2Items: You must be 18 years or older to use our services
You must provide accurate information when registering
You are responsible for securing your account
You may not use the platform for illegal purposes
section3Items: Deposits and withdrawals via TRC20 network
termsContent.section4Desc: All deposit and withdrawal transactions are conducted via TRC20 network (USDT). We are not responsible for:
section4Items: Transactions sent to wrong wallet addresses
Transactions sent via different blockchain networks
termsContent.riskDesc: Investing in cryptocurrencies carries high risk and may result in total loss of investment. Crypto asset values can fluctuate significantly. You should carefully consider your financial capability and seek independent advice before investing.
termsContent.section6Desc: The Copy Trade feature allows you to automatically copy trades from experts. However, past performance does not guarantee future results. You are fully responsible for your decision to use Copy Trade.
termsContent.section7Desc: The referral program provides rewards for users who refer friends. We reserve the right to:
section7Items: Cancel bonuses if fraud is detected
Limit the number of times a referral code can be used
termsContent.section8Desc: We are committed to protecting your personal information according to our privacy policy. You are responsible for:
section8Items: Keeping your password and OTP codes confidential
Enabling two-factor authentication (2FA) for added security
section9Items: Service interruptions due to maintenance or upgrades
termsContent.section10Desc: We reserve the right to change terms of service at any time. Continued use of services after changes implies acceptance of the new terms.
termsContent.section11Desc: If you have any questions about the terms of service, please contact:
termsContent.agreeTerms: By using IC-Gold, you confirm that you have read and agree to the above terms.
